column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column4: Definition
A unique ID for the plate. Formats may vary, but this needs to be unique. MUST BE UNIQUE
A human readable name for the plate.
The date when the plate was plated. Format: 2015-01-30
The contents of the plate. Example: Tissue, DNA
The rep number of the plate.
The type of plate. Example: 96-well, Costar rack
A brief description of whether the plate exists or not.
Any additional comments about the plate.
If the plate was made using seed, provide the Seed ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made using an isolate, provide te isolate ID here. If not applicable leave blank.
If the plate was made from a row, provide the Row ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made from a plant, provide the Plant ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made from a specific well, provide the Well ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made from a microbe, provide the Microbe ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made from a separate culture, provide the Culture ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made from a tissue, provide the Tissue ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made from a specific sample, provide Sample ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
If the plate was made from a specific plate, provide the Plate ID here. If not applicable leave blank.
If the plate was made from specific DNA, provide the DNA ID here. If not applicable, leave blank.
